meanings: (시각·청각 등의) sense, (특히 촉각) sensation, (특히 촉각) feeling

vlive.korean: 패션 감각이 둔하다? I am not fashionable? 듣기 View video KIM WOO SEOK : 오늘, 우석이와 함께해요

vlive.english: Dong Hyun, what sense are you in charge of?

vlive.korean: 내 다리가 약간 감각이 없어졌어 - 쥐나? My legs are numb. - Do you have cramps? 듣기 View video TWICE : 1시간전...
vlive.english: My legs are numb. - Do you have cramps?

examples.korean: His fingers were numbed with the cold. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 추워서 손가락에 감각이 없었다[손이 곱았다]. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
